Package com.galvanize.bluestwosmoviereviews.controllers

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.galvanize.bluestwosmoviereviews.controllers.UserController
  • @CrossOrigin
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/v1/")
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    REST controller for managing user operations.

    The UserController class handles HTTP requests for operations such as creating, updating, retrieving, and deleting users.
